language.description: Change Bot's language to another language from the list.
language.warningDeprecatedLang: {{emojis.warn}} Deprecation | **You're using __old language names__ (english or french) please __update__ the name of the language by using {{prefix}}lang set en-US for example**
language.defaultMessage:
The currently used language is **{{lang}}**
To change the language use the command {{prefix}}language set <languageName>
Available languages: **{{allLang}}**`
language.infoEmbed:
Name ‚ù± **{{name}}**
Regional name ‚ù± **{{regionalName}}**
Identifier ‚ù± **{{identifier}}**

prefix.invalidPrefix: {{emojis.no}} | The prefix is not valid (more than 3 chars) !
prefix.currPrefix:
Current prefix is **{{prefix}}**

DJ.description: Setup a role which will have access to music commands.
DJ.invalidValue: {{emojis.no}} | No role specified or invalid role!
DJ.failedRemoved: {{emojis.no}} | Failed to remove role, this is usually occurred because you didn't set any DJ role
DJ.defaultMessage:
Current DJ role: **{{role}}**
Set DJ role: **{{prefix}}DJ set @DJ**
Reset role **{{prefix}}DJ reset**

staff.description: Setup a role which will have access to staff commands even if user hasn't admin perm.
staff.invalidValue: {{emojis.no}} | No role specified or invalid role!
staff.failedRemoved: {{emojis.no}} | Failed to remove role, this is usually occurred because you didn't set any Staff role
staff.defaultMessage:
Current staff role: **{{role}}**
Set staff role: **{{prefix}}staff set @staff**
Reset role **{{prefix}}staff reset**

notify.description: Send a message in a channel when your favourite youtuber post a new video.
notify.invalidChannel: {{emojis.no}} | Invalid channel, please mention the channel where notifications will be send.
notify.noChannel: {{emojis.no}} | no channel provided, please mention the channel where notifications will be send.

notifier-message.description: Edit the message send when your favourite youtuber post a new video
notifier-message.provide:
Alright, please send a message in **THIS** channel the message which will be send if the youtuber send a new video


Note: if you want cancel this operation, just tell 'cancel'
notifier-message.example: {emojis.youtube} Hey @everyone, **{youtuber.name}** just posted a new video named \`{video.title}\`\nlink: {video.url} - uploaded the {video.date}
